    FLARE

    Forecasting Lake And Reservoir Ecosystems

    Falling Creek Reservoir, Virginia, USA

    The FLARE project creates open-source software for flexible, scalable, robust, and near-real time iterative ecological forecasts in lakes and reservoirs.

    FLARE is a collaboration between:
    Department of Biological Sciences, Virginia Tech
    ACIS Lab, Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Florida
    FLARE is supported by the US National Science Foundation as part of awards CNS-1737424 and DBI-1933102â€‹.
